creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles H. Bell
description: Wedgwood pearlware partial dessert service, porcelain, printed and colored in green with designs of shells and seaweed, includes thirty-three pieces .1-12 twelve side plates, di.7-1/2 in.; .13-14abc two sauce tureens with lids and saucers, H.6-1/2 in.; .15-.22 eight dessert plates, di.8-3/4 in.; .23-26 four lozenge-shaped dishes, L.9-15/16 x W.7-1/2 in.; .27-29 three circular dishes, lobed, di.7-15/16 in.; .30-31 two circular dishes,lobed, di.8-1/2 in.; .32-33 two quatrefoil dishes, L.12-3/4 x W.8-3/4 in.
title: Side plate
